name: Forged in Fire
description:
Based on the Forged in Fire TV show. Build and manage your own forge in a medieval village. Craft and collect a wide variety of popular Bronze, Iron, and Steel weapons from a number of different cultures and eras in time. Craft them all and become the Master Smith.

Smelt metals to forge Swords, Daggers, Axes and many other weapon types to grow your business and your craft.

Complete quests to:
Grow your village while learning from the Master Smith
Supply weapons to the local nobility to growing your bladesmithing business.
Sell extra Metals / Ingots to build your wealth
Track your progress against other smiths using the Leaderboards.

Please Note:
Some game items may be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
